title: Model Testing
selectProject: Select a project with a trained model to test
noModel: No trained model found for this project. Complete training first.

chat.placeholder: Type a message to test the model...
chat.empty: Start a conversation to test your fine-tuned model.

noAdapter: No trained adapters available. Complete training first.
adapterLoaded: Adapter loaded. Send a message to test your fine-tuned model.

ab.title: A/B Comparison
ab.hint: Run the same prompt on base model and tuned model for advanced side-by-side analysis.
ab.promptPlaceholder: Enter one prompt for side-by-side comparison...

modeDesc.auto: Auto decides mode based on available memory.
modeDesc.sequential: Runs one model after another to reduce memory pressure.
modeDesc.parallel: Runs both models at the same time for faster comparison.

ab.needAdapter: Please select a trained adapter first.
ab.conclusionPlaceholder: Optional notes: Why did you vote this way?
ab.saveHint: Save this comparison as a project-level evaluation record.
